location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 368: Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Colonel Henry Creswicke Rawlinson, Political Agent in Turkish Arabia, Baghdad

mods.abstract: In this letter Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, encloses for Henry Creswicke Rawlinson's perusal a despatch (not included) that Kemball has addressed to William Taylour Thomson, Her Majesty's Charg√© d'Affaires at the Court of Persia, Tehran, informing the latter of Kemball's communication to the Government of Bombay, following William Taylour Thomson's announcement that he has suspended his diplomatic relations with the Persian Government.
